entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
